how_to_add_scenarios: 1. Copy one of the existing scenario objects
3. Modify the 'trip_data' values to reflect the new scenario
4. Key variables to adjust for different Mother Stations:
- mother_station: Name of the dispatching plant
- gas_cost: May vary by Mother Station
- plant_cost: May vary by Mother Station
- round_trip_distance: Critical factor - distance impacts multiple costs
- truck_turnaround_time: Varies with distance and logistics
- skid_turnaround_time: Varies with distance and operations
comparison_focus: The scenarios above compare delivering to the SAME customer from DIFFERENT Mother Stations
- Which Mother Station provides best profit margin
- Time savings from using closer stations
- Cost component impact (which costs change most)
key_insights: - Lower round trip distance (reduces trucking costs)
- Potentially different gas costs (may be higher or lower)
Net profitability depends on the balance of these factors
